name: A Totally Normal Knight Story
description:
The following is a totally normal game about a knight. There is nothing unusual about this game at all. You play as a normal knight from a normal kingdom. Your goal is to make it to slay the dragon and save the princess. Only play this game if you want to play something completely ordinary.

(Warning! This game may contain content that some may find disturbing. There may also be minor spelling errors or bad grammar. Please pursue at your own risk.)
